snippet.title: Ghost Moon High Noon Official Trailer | Eerie Trails Entertainment
snippet.description:
I worked as an Environmental Artist and Cinematographer on this game over the last year. 

Wishlist on Steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2936420/Ghost_Moon_High_Noon/

Guide the half-ghost bounty hunter Valentina Sombra through the haunted town of La Enmienda in this western top-down puzzle-shooter. Fire off spectral trick shots and wrangle your environment to put down rowdy spirits and help the grieving townsfolk move on.

#videogames #developer #gamedev #ErieTrailsEntertainment #GhostMoonHighNoon #KVW
